nodes.text: The Parliock system was located in the Ariarch sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Mid Rim. It shared its name with the Peacekeeping of Parliock, a conflict in which members of the Jedi Order were involved at some point prior to the Clone Wars of 22 BBY to 19 BBY.
The Parliock system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square J-6.
